```{=html}
<style>
/* CV Page Styles */
.cv-header {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background-color: #f8f9fa;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

.cv-header .btn {
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.cv-header .btn-primary {
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: white;
  border: 2px solid #007bff;
}

.cv-header .btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: #0056b3;
  border-color: #0056b3;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.cv-embed {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 100%;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  border-radius: 8px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.cv-embed iframe {
  display: block;
  border: none;
  min-height: 800px;
}

/* Responsive adjustments */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .cv-embed iframe {
    height: 600px;
  }
  
  .cv-header .btn {
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    font-size: 1rem;
  }
}

/* Print styles */
@media print {
  .cv-header {
    display: none;
  }
}
</style>
```
